00125   inline void updateTraceBackgroundImage(){
00126    QString image = KFileDialog::getOpenFileName(QString::null,
00127             QString::null, this, i18n("Select the background image..."));
00128             
00129      if(image != "") setTraceBackgroundImage(image);            
00130   };
